result.title: Bill Poucher accepts questions in the account of the Quora service
result.content:
Bill Poucher, Executive Director of ACM-ICPC, accepts questions within «Session with Bill Poucher» in the account of the Quora service.

Poucher is glad to answer the questions «about the ICPC, ACM, computer science, tomatoes, fishing, world, politics, arcane topics, kids, grand kids, and Marsha» and notes that he will be frank. (Annotation: Marsha Poucher – Bill’s spouse with whom they have celebrated the 46th wedding anniversary recently).

There is a reception of questions and vote for the most interesting of them. Questions are accepted till June 25 at 7:00 (UTC) after this moment it is worth looking forward to hearing from Bill.
